description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Job_ProfileObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Job_ProfileObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Job_ProfileObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to an existing Job Profile. Only needed when updating the reference id (Job Profile ID or Job Code) for the Job Profile.

Job_Profile_Data.description: Unique Identifier for a Job Profile. Also known as Job Profile ID.

validation.validation: You do not have a sequence generator setup. Specify a job code.

Job_Profile_Data.description: On a Put this is the date the change to the Job Profile will take effect.  Will default to today if not submitted.On a Get this is the As of Effective Date specified in the Response Filter or today's date if no request criteria is specified.During implementation, we recommend using a date of 01-01-1900 for the initial entry.

validation.validation: The effective date of the change [date] cannot be earlier than the earliest effective date [early].

Job_Profile_Basic_Data.description: Boolean attribute indicates if the Job Profile is inactive.
The name of the job profile.

validation.validation: Job Profile Name is required.

Job_Profile_Basic_Data.description: Boolean attribute identifying whether Job Code should be included in Name (Display ID within Workday).
Private Job Profile Title. This field is the same as Job Title Default in the online page.
Text attribute identifying Job Profile Summary.
Rich text attribute identifying Job Profile Job Description.

The Additional Job Description is only available when the Recruiting functional area is enabled. Use job posting templates to control where the Additional Job Description displays. Example: Define a Job Description for external job postings and an Additional Job Description for internal job postings.
Boolean attribute indicating whether a work shift is required for workers in this job profile.
Boolean attribute indicating whether the job profile is considered a public job.

Job_Profile_Data.description: Element containing Worker's Compensation Code data for a Job Profile. This element does a complete replacement of data based on what is submitted. All Worker's Compensation Codes must be included for an update (unless none will be touched).

validation.validation: The Workers' Compensation Code: [WCC] - has a location in common with one of the other Workers' Compensation Codes for this Job Profile. Remove one of these workers' compensation codes.
The Workers' Compensation Code: [WCC] - has a country region site in common with one of the other Workers' Compensation Codes for this Job Profile. Remove one of these workers' compensation codes.

The Workers' Compensation Code: [WCC] - has a country (without country region or locations) in common with one of the other Workers' Compensation Codes for this Job Profile. Remove one of these workers' compensation codes.

validation.validation: If Delete is Yes, do not send any certifications in the Certification Qualification Replacement Data element. All certification data will be deleted for the Job Profile or Position Restriction.

Job_Profile_Data.description: Element containing the qualification data for a Position Restriction or Job Profile.

Integration_Document_FieldObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Integration_Document_FieldObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
For types that require a parent reference, contains a unique identifier for an instance of a parent object.
For types that require a parent reference, the unique identifier type of a parent object.

Integration_Document_FieldObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Document_Field_Result_Data.description: Integration Document Field Reference.  Eligibility Criteria element is used in conjunction with Workday delivered integrations.

Job_Profile_Data.description: Result of the evaluation of an External Field based on a contextual instance.

Compensation_GradeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Compensation_GradeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Compensation_GradeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Job_Profile_Compensation_Data.description: References an active Compensation Grade which is directly associated with the Job Profile.  Workers with this Job Profile will be able to be assigned this Compensation Grade by default.

Compensation_Grade_ProfileObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Compensation_Grade_ProfileObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Compensation_Grade_ProfileObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Job_Profile_Compensation_Data.description: References active Compensation Grade Profiles which are directly associated with the Job Profile.  Workers with this Job Profile will be able to be assigned a Compensation Grade Profile from the associated list based on eligibility.

Job_Profile_Data.description: Element contains Compensation related data for the Job Profile.  Currently, only an optional Compensation Grade association for the Job Profile is available.

validation.validation: Compensation grade profiles are not valid for the compensation grade.
Compensation Grade is required.

Job_Profile_Union_Membership_Data.description: References an active Union Membership which is directly associated with the Job Profile.

Job_Profile_Union_Membership_Data.description: References an active Allowed Unions which is directly associated with the Job Profile.

validation.validation: You must specify Allowed Unions if Union Membership is Required.
You can't specify Allowed Unions if Union Membership is Not Allowed.

Job_Profile_Work-Study_Data.description: References a Work-Study Award which is directly associated with the Job Profile.
